subject: Re: More August 15th prediction--other sources
author: Not given
full_text:
It's always questionable when dealing with paranormal. In this it seems like misinformation is a past time but with this being on a fairly large scale across the ITC world. 

I've got pretty much nothing myself that meshes with anything anyone else has though other than stay out of it ... etc etc.. but I do keep trying.


Shane


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Yeah, I don't know what to make of the predictiosn either, but it seems
> everyone that asks gets the same answers.  If we were asking anything else
> the answers would be taken as evidence, but with predictions it's not
> believed. Doesn't that make all information obtained via EVP questionable?
>  Frank-S
>
